entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pikangikum
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -28.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Lake Airport 08:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 75 %

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
